TopicTitle: Video or UI settings help needed.

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

I see people on youTube with a lot of open space on either side of their altimeter, where they can have two Kerbal Engineer displays on each side.

My altimeter is huge and I can only have one KE display on the left side without overlapping something else.

I tried changing the resolution, but that seems to only change the outer window size not any of the UI displays. a.g. altimeter/Nav ball

There was also a UI size setting that i set to tiny, but i didn't notice any size change.

Thanks for any help you can give me.
last i looked it was 1280 X 1024, but that sounds more like my 2nd smaller monitor. Maybe that's what i am doing wrong... trying to match it to the wrong monitor.
